info.title: NHL API
info.description: NHL API for the new version. Special thanks to [dword4](https://gitlab.com/dword4/nhlapi) and [openapi-devtools](https://github.com/AndrewWalsh/openapi-devtools).

parameters.name: game_id
parameters.description: The ID of the game to retrieve

200.description: Play by play of specific game

parameters.name: team_abbrev
parameters.description: The three letter code of the team

parameters.name: team_abbrev
parameters.description: The three letter code of the team

placeName.description: Only available from certain endpoints; Place of team (Colorado).

name.description: Only available from certain endpoints; Mascot of team (Avalanche).

awayTeamSplit.description: Only available from certain endpoints, and when the team is away

homeTeamSplit.description: Only available from certain endpoints, and when the team is home

gameOutcome.description: If the period ended in regulation or overtime (only available in past games)
